career: Career prospects CHRIST (Deemed to be university) strongly works to empower students with various career prospects and skill sets that are required to achieve personal and professional excellence. Career options and the preparations for BBA (FIB) students are embedded with the combination of focusing on their interests and skills sets that coincides with the market demand and earning potential. Students are provided with the options for entrepreneurship skill development, career options enriching knowledge in all areas of business viz., Marketing, Sales, Finance, Operations, HR, and even Information Technology to excel along with the leadership and managerial acumens. Regularly arranging seminars, workshops creating close co-ordination and interaction with the industrial experts to provide valuable insight on the current trends, advanced technologies, and work culture
